reviews.customers_say: Customers find the sweater well-made and comfortable, with a relaxed fit without being bulky.

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great sweater!
items.body: I love this sweater! I got a medium after reading that it runs large (I'm 5'4"), and the medium fits perfectly oversized. The quality is great, relatively heavy knit, but not hot. The color (I got off-white) is a little more creamy than I expected, but I still love it. I washed AND DRIED it in the dryer... it did shrink a tiny bit, but it's still oversized and comfortable. Read more
items.author: Customer

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars So good that I bought two more!
items.body: I have to let you all know about this very nice sweater. The hand is what you would expect from a heavy cotton sweater, and when it arrived, it was neatly folded - in spite of it being vacuum sealed. I mention this, because I also bought a sweater from a "also bought/recommended" alternative, which was an instant return as soon as i took it out of the package ( THAT competitor's sweater came very wrinkled and looked awful and cheap). This Trendy Queen sweater which I ordered in cream, was soft, neatly packaged, and felt great on the body. Looked so cute as an oversized, that I ordered 2 more - red and nutmeg (brown). I did size down on these 2, but the look is still great. I hope they wash well (cold water, lay flat to dry), but I'm sure they'll be fine. This Trendy Queen company is really great, and the one to support! Read more
items.author: S. Peshkoff

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Beautiful sweater!
items.body: Beautiful sweater! The color is exactly as pictured. It’s nice & thick and very comfortable. Read more
items.author: Comicfam

items.title: 4.0 out of 5 stars Cute, but color is off.
items.body: PROS: Seems ok. Fit is ok, but not oversized. Good for the mild winter of the south. CONS: Very heavy without being too warm. Color is not as depicted on site. Fell is ok. Not really soft. I'm not sure if it will keep it's shape. Due to the poor quality of the material, I do not think it will last. Overpriced, even though I bought it on sale. BOTTOM LINE: ok for winter in the South. Wong color. Buy it at your own risk. I'm 5'8" 128 lbs. Read more
items.author: Th Anonymous

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Cable Knit Sweater
items.body: These are beautiful sweaters. I bought three in total; two for a family member who saw mine and fell in love. These are affordable luxury, and appear well made. Length is great. I figure if it lasts a few years (Potentially five, possibly longer.), then it's worth every penny. No washing issues. It also hangs really well. Read more
items.author: Miss Poison

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Comfy but not cozy
items.body: The mauve color was accurate and size small is really pretty big...my hips measure 40" and the small was roomy. The fit is boxy. The material has a heavy cotton feel and is fairly soft once washed. Read more
items.author: Customer

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great buy
items.body: Absolutely adorable. Isn’t snug which I love. Comfortable shape. Good quality. Not cropped. Read more
items.author: Haleigh Stone

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Watch the sizing
items.body: Thick, soft, cozy. Not oversized if you follow the amazon size recommendation. I wear a medium in every top. I would normally buy a large in a sweater like this. I bought a medium using amazons size recommendation. It fits great but is not oversized. If you want fit like the model has you should size up at least 1 size but probably 2. I will probably buy another one in a different color and a larger size just for fit variety Read more
items.author: Amy

short_description:
Womens Dress is made for a polished look that still feels comfortable to wear. It is designed to sit cleanly on the body with a flattering shape that works for day plans and dressier moments without feeling overdone.

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

For the best look, smooth the fabric, check the neckline placement, and pair it with shoes that match the occasion and the hem length.

The design is easy to style with simple accessories and works well in photos thanks to clean lines and a balanced silhouette.
about_this_item:

long_description:
Womens Dress is a versatile piece you can reach for when you want a put-together look that still feels comfortable. The goal is simple: a silhouette that reads polished, photographs well, and stays wearable for a full day or a long night.

Fit and sizing Fit is where most outfits win or lose. This design aims for a balanced shape with a defined line through the torso, a clean waist, and a smooth finish through the hips and legs. If you prefer a more relaxed feel, size up; if you like a closer fit, stay true to size. Sizes may include: One Size.

Fabric and comfort Comfort is not just about softness. It is also about movement and how the fabric behaves as you walk, sit, and stand. A fabric blend with a bit of give helps it keep its shape while still feeling wearable.

Highlights A clean neckline and a refined silhouette for an elevated look. Designed to layer easily with jackets, wraps, or sweaters. Works well with both minimal accessories and statement pieces.

How to style Styling ideas: keep it minimal with neutral shoes and one standout accessory. For a relaxed daytime look, add a denim jacket or cardigan. For events, switch to a bolder shoe and a small clutch for a sharper finish.

Color notes Available colors may include: Mauve Taupe, Nutmeg, Azure Blue, Light Mauve, Pastel Pink, Cream, Army Green, Black, Camel, Dusty Blue, Navy Blue, Cocoa, Dark Sage, Red. If a shade is sold out, check back as availability can change.

Care Care guidance matters if you want it to keep its shape and finish. Follow the label first.
